EVALUATION INSTRUCTIONS: Please help us maintain the quality of the training courses by taking a minute and answering the following questions. Click on the "Star" that best describes your response of poor to excellent for each question.
(P=Poor, F=Fair, G=Good, GR=Great, E=Excellent)

Please enter the name as you would like it to appear on the certificate. If you passed the optional quiz(s) for this class you will be able to print an achievement certificate, otherwise you will be able to print a completion certificate.

CERTIFICATE FORMATTING: Certificate printing requires a one-time downloaded file to setup special formatting options. You can safely accept the downloaded file as free from viruses. If you have problems with downloading this file, you can manually set the printing options by selecting the "File / Page Setup" menu option in your browser, and remove the header and footer, select "Landscape" and set all margins to .4 inch.
